programme.title: The Sound of Happiness S1 Ep202
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan S1 Ep5241
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep249
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life S1 Ep250
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go S1 Ep3312
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan S1 Ep63
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Chef's Unexpected Landing: Hakka Kitchen 2 2 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chefs Unexpected Landing: Hakka Kitchen 2 unites Leeteuk, James, and a lineup of Korean and Taiwanese celebrities to create inventive Hakka-Korean fusion dishes. Using traditional Hakka ingredients with Korean flavours, the team tests their creations through pop-ups and food trucks in Korea. 2

programme.title: Girls Tease S1 Ep31
programme.desc: This show focuses on the issues that are most important to urban modern women. It combines current events with discussions of life's major and minor problems and invites various specialists to address various difficulties. Netizens will occasionally attend the show to share their own stories and ask questions of the guests and experts, making the topics more relevant and audience-focused!

programme.title: Top Singers S1 Ep692
programme.desc: The show 'Top Singers' aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz S1 Ep1100
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Just for You S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Two brothers, living just 300 meters apart, lead vastly different lives. The elder, Kai-Teng Chiao, a former athlete turned plumber, gave up his dreams to support his family and finds unexpected healing through a connection with a distant, cold-hearted prosecutor. Meanwhile, the younger, Hsi-Ming Chiao, a successful lawyer, is forced to confront the painful past he buried, which includes his breakup and his fathers suicide, when he meets Pao-Chi Hsu, the woman who holds the key to the memories he lost a decade ago.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong's ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: The Movie Emperor
programme.desc: Hong Kong megastar Lau Wai Chi aspires to win a film award. He teams up with director Lin Hao to make a film about rural China so as to win at the international film festival, and experiences local village life for the farmer's role. This ends up in a series of hilarious events instead.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: This is a Thai romantic comedy. The story portrays a young Thai man and woman who meet by coincidence while on vacation in South Korea. They decide to tour the country together while keeping their names a secret from each other. From unwillingly at first, then become best friends and fall in love finally.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: I Fine Thank You Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions, Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Smashing Frank
programme.desc: Four young thieves wearing bunny masks pull off the heists targeting the rich. Calling themselves "Frank," their mission is less about money and more about exposing corruption through graffiti and viral videos. However, when they collide with a powerful church involved in a money-laundering scheme, their mission spirals into a deadly game.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his father's serious illness.

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earth's surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Former world champion boxer Fai meets fiery young fighter Qi in Macau. As he mentors Qi for an upcoming MMA tournament, Fai rekindles his passion for fighting, life, and the people he cares about.

programme.title: Way We Talk, The
programme.desc: This is a soul-searching story about three youths: Wolf, Sophie and Alan, each living with a different form of deafness. Through sign language, they cultivate a profound friendship and offer each other unwavering support. United by love and friendship, the trio embarks on a journey of self-discovery and resilience.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. However, Lin soon discovers that another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Finally, Lin battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content, yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Flying Guillotine 2
programme.desc: In a time of anti-Manchu sentiment, Emperor Yong Zheng employs his ruthless Blood Hound Corps to silence any dissenters. Only one man and his signature weapon, The Flying Guillotine, stand in their way.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yu's beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by 'Dragon Gate Palace' one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of 'Dragon Gate Palace', and uncover a long-hidden secret.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Lo's brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hu's house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hu's pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: After avenging his father's death by assassinating a high official, Li Yue disappears into hiding as a fugitive. His fiance enlists a swordsmanwho secretly loves herto search for him, unaware that the bandit Xiao Mei has also fallen for Li Yue. Their intertwined love quadrangle explores themes of sacrifice, devotion and selfless love.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government's secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor's ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Long's wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: Angel with the Iron Fists
programme.desc: Lo Wei directs and stars as the chief detective in this gripping thriller, playing alongside Lily Ho, who excels in the role of an undercover avenger that can fight as well as she flirts! Caught between the crime bosses known as Baldhead and Black Widow, she only has four choices: punch, kick, shoot or bombard with explosives!

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chun's plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charn's beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dong's concubine as he knows Dong's adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrate's daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Honey Bunny & The Dart Gun Granny S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru S1 Ep46
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.desc: David Lee opposes Allegra's hiring. The police finds about judge Wackner's court and prefer taking their arrests to his court. Oscar Rivi signs a deal to supply Marijuana to Marijuna dispensaries.

programme.title: The Good Fight S5 Ep10
programme.desc: Marissa mounts a strong defense in Vinetta's court for Matteo, while Diane tries to get an interview with him, Liz and Allegra defend drug dealer Oscar Rivi.

programme.title: The Good Fight S6 Ep1
programme.desc: After being promoted to top partner at the firm, Liz is forced to accept Ri'Chard Lane as a new name partner brought on to help manage her staff and client load. Meanwhile, Diane experiences dj vu.

programme.title: Mommy Would Never Hurt You
programme.desc: Riley wants to rebuild her estranged relationship with her mother and little sister who is ill. But when Riley realizes her sister may not actually be as sick as she appears, Riley's mother stops at nothing to keep her daughters with her forever.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Nicholas works as a dentist in Canada. However, he faces difficulties when a new neighbour moves in and he learns that he is Jimmy Tudeski, a contract killer, who is also known as Jimmy The Tulip.

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: New York "date doctor" Alex Hitchens (Will Smith) tries to charm gossip columnist Sara Melas (Eva Mendes) at the same time he is coaching shy Albert (Kevin James) on how to win the love of beautiful heiress Allegra Cole (Amber Valletta).

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: Hope Springs
programme.desc: Arnold and Kay have been married for 30 years, and have drifted apart. To save their marriage, they attend an intense, week-long counseling session to work on their relationship.

programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lanka's lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but don't be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Battle for the Bay - Follow the Bay Family's matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies' leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies' lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies' first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park's main attraction.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Bears Thanksgiving - Spy on the summer cubs as they learn to climb trees and forage for food in preparation for their release into the wild. Get surprised by a set of new arrivals, observe the annual pre-hibernation eating binge, and enjoy a bear-friendly Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Goodbye Campers - Prepare for the summer cubs' release with Roger, then meet Ace and Little Blueberry, two newbies with serious health issues who will have to stay over the winter with the Z cubs. Later, celebrate as six healthy, happy bears embark on their new life.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision - it's how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Bears Thanksgiving - Spy on the summer cubs as they learn to climb trees and forage for food in preparation for their release into the wild. Get surprised by a set of new arrivals, observe the annual pre-hibernation eating binge, and enjoy a bear-friendly Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Goodbye Campers - Prepare for the summer cubs' release with Roger, then meet Ace and Little Blueberry, two newbies with serious health issues who will have to stay over the winter with the Z cubs. Later, celebrate as six healthy, happy bears embark on their new life.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision - it's how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lanka's lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but don't be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Battle for the Bay - Follow the Bay Family's matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies' leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Queen of the Bay - Chase Anna to the Townies' lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies' first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a park's main attraction.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Bears Thanksgiving - Spy on the summer cubs as they learn to climb trees and forage for food in preparation for their release into the wild. Get surprised by a set of new arrivals, observe the annual pre-hibernation eating binge, and enjoy a bear-friendly Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Child of Fire - For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Bears Thanksgiving - Spy on the summer cubs as they learn to climb trees and forage for food in preparation for their release into the wild. Get surprised by a set of new arrivals, observe the annual pre-hibernation eating binge, and enjoy a bear-friendly Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Leopard - Prowl the Sri Lankan jungle with the leopard, who is a master of camouflage. See how this formidable feline hunter has adapted perfectly to the hot, dry climate on the island, then discover its best tricks for stalking and catching deer.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Einstein Rules - Come full circle as the dry season descends and the Waterfront Pride enjoys good hunting and renewed confidence in their territory. Then celebrate the success of former outsider Einstein, who gets down to business as the king of his very own pride.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fire's pivotal role in shaping Australia's natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020's brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent's wildlife.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Super Powers - See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: After The Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fire's pivotal role in shaping Australia's natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020's brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent's wildlife.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Gates of Hell - Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Horses of the Sun - Grvy's zebras population has dropped by 50% in less than 20 years. Environmentalists say that if we aren't vigilant, they could disappear all together. Lewa Conservancy is at the heart of efforts to protect the species so that they can replenish their numbers

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Carnivores of the Coral Garden - The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Magicians of the Reef - Arabia's coral reefs are home to some of nature's most impressive illusionists. Creatures can pulsate with colour, transform in the blink of an eye, or perform riveting displays of showmanship. Because in these dangerous waters, disguise is crucial.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Island Feast - Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just can't resist.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Defenders of the Reef - It's summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Turtle's Legacy - The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Ireland - Explore an island surrounded by the mighty Atlantic ocean, subjected to pounding waves and driving rain. From the Cliffs of Moher to the Giant's Causeway, this land has been shaped and reshaped by the power of water and violent geological forces.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision - it's how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Supersenses S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Super Powers - See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Shark Squad S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Island of the White Shark - Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.title: Shark Squad S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bimini Sharklab - Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Boss Shark: Battle of the Sexes
programme.desc: Witness a shark competition unlike any other, where great whites go head-to-head in jaw-dropping tests of strength. Risk it all with shark specialist Dr. Riley Elliott as he tries to answer an age-old question: Which sex reigns supreme?

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey's heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the ocean's vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the Extreme - Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Jamie focuses on Christmas, with all the deliciousness and joy of the season.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S31 Ep18
programme.desc: Series 31, Episode 18 - Together on Graham's sofa tonight: Hollywood great Jodie Foster, starring in the latest season of TV drama: 'True Detective: Night Country', Oscar-winner Olivia Colman, talking about her new mystery comedy 'Wicked Little Letters', US comedy great Wanda Sykes, whose new Netflix special is 'Wanda Sykes: I'm an Entertainer', and doyenne of British TV Lorraine Kelly, discussing her debut novel 'The Island Swimmer'.

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Retro Week - Siba and Paul send the Bakers back in time for retro week, recalling classics like Choux Pastry Swans, steamed puddings and layered terrines. It's another challenging week for the bakers, who are all out to claim the title of Star Baker and avoid being sent home.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Burgundy - Fred and Michael Caines MBE check out Burgundy's best bites at La Cote d'Or, before enjoying a farm-to-fork experience in the Ouche Valley and some of Beaune's patisserie perfection.

programme.title: Billionaire Resorts S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Malaysia - This week, we're in the jungle, on the tropical Malaysian island of Langkawi. At the Datai resort, mega wealthy guests enjoy the height of luxury in the middle of a remote 10-million-year-old rainforest - as well as special access to one of the top 10 beaches on the planet.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 5 - Retiree Dennis and part-time school worker Christine had always dreamed of living by the sea in a place big enough to host their large family.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Burgundy - Fred and Michael Caines MBE check out Burgundy's best bites at La Cote d'Or, before enjoying a farm-to-fork experience in the Ouche Valley and some of Beaune's patisserie perfection.

programme.desc: Christmas Chocolat - Rachel visits Stockholm to learn tips from an award-winning chocolatier. Then she makes venison ragu and other dishes that are perfect for a celebration.

programme.desc: Chef Donal Skehan and his dog Max visit West Cork to meet regional food producers and visit local landmarks.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S3 Ep6
programme.desc: South Wales - Fred and Thomasina Miers sample south Wales' scrumptious offerings, from fantastic flame-grilled fare to unique and unassuming pub grub in Usk.

programme.desc: Faith's Geodome - Simon and the team go to Devon where camp site owner Faith wants to create a unique property using an invention of her late father's. Faith wants the B&B's rooms to have a celestial theme.

programme.desc: Guillaume travels to Nature Urbaine, Europe's largest rooftop garden, and uses their produce to make a spring salad, Guillaume catches up with Australian rugby player Kurtley Beale for a meal.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Burgundy - Fred and Michael Caines MBE check out Burgundy's best bites at La Cote d'Or, before enjoying a farm-to-fork experience in the Ouche Valley and some of Beaune's patisserie perfection.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Special Occasions - Rachel celebrates the indulgent side of chocolate. She creates a luxurious chocolate mousse with a twist, and adds a chocolatey take to a pasta dish, cacio e pepe.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 3 - Rick meets Springwatch presenter and biologist Gillian Burke, who takes Rick on a walk through a rare habitat called an Atlantic temperate rainforest on the banks of the Helford River.

programme.title: Nadiya's Family Favourites S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Family Get-Togethers - Nadiya creates dishes ideal for family get-togethers, learns how to perfect her BBQ technique with BBQ-King James, and meets Paul Ainsworth, Michelin Star Chef.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Liam and Hannah's Shepherd's Hut - Situated in a water meadow in north Dorset, rare breed farmers Liam and Hannah's 1930s shepherd's hut was bought for just 5 almost 40 years ago. Simon and the team help them to restore it.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Faith's Geodome - Simon and the team go to Devon where camp site owner Faith wants to create a unique property using an invention of her late father's. Faith wants the B&B's rooms to have a celestial theme.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep76
programme.desc: Intensive Purposes - After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility using only the four phone calls they've been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it's complicated when Tina's new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez's undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep77
programme.desc: The Unshakeable Bear - Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canada's most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she's not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib S3 Ep78
programme.desc: Ba-Ba Town - The Templeton's hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Baby's name.

programme.desc: Slamtools - Garby and Click-Clack must rescue the Dinotruxafter they are tied down by a destructive tribe of Slamtools who made an evil deal with D-Structs

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa's New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky's Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Hide And Toot - The animals are playing hide and seek. Huffty gets upset when his trunk keeps giving him away. Can Raa Raa and his friends show the little elephant that his trunk is really rather wonderful?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Boing Boing - Raa Raa has got a new pogo stick. He is having a great time bouncing around, but his friends aren't so sure he seems to be causing rather a lot of damage. Is there any way Raa Raa can practise without destroying their jungle home?

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep24
programme.desc: DJ Catnip Gets His Groove Back - Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats' everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Kitty Fairy Gets Sick - When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays - Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: SPIRIT OF CHRISTMAS (RIDING FREE) S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Spirit Of Christmas - Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus - When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special - George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvin's time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didn't work quite how they'd hoped. George and Harold realize they need to help Santa remember the true meaning of Christmas before it's gone forever!

programme.desc: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices - While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Rocket Race / Magic / Parents - Tommy is in a Rocket Race, Tim supports his brother. Tim distracts Tia when Tusky is in the washing machine. The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep124
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Christmas Show / The Crew Builds A Giant Sled Ramp - Happy Holidays from Rubble & Crew and Truffles the pig, stars of Builder Cove's first-ever Christmas show...on ice!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep308
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Duck Plane - A flock of migrating ducks settles in Builder Cove! It's up to Rubble & Crew to help the ducks start moving south.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo - Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela. Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep617
programme.desc: The Snow Spectacular - Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Birth / The Revelation - Young Franois witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S7 Ep717
programme.desc: Pups Save a Bah Humdinger - Mayor Humdinger is being very naughty on Christmas Eve and it's up to the Paw Patrol to help Santa and save Christmas.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1014
programme.desc: Pups Save Great Uncle Smiley's Cup - Mayor Humdinger enlists Digi & Tal to help him win a hockey game, it's up to the pups to undo the mayhem the team causes.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep224
programme.desc: Pups Save Skye - Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep106
programme.desc: Spaceland / New Rocket / Babysitting - Tim, Tommy and Tia get lost at a play centre. Tim tries to find a new rocket that's perfect for him. Tim tries to bend all the rules when Terri comes to babysit.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 Ep304
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Super Mega Movie Screen - A new Super Squirrely Whirly movie is playing at the drive-in theater! But when Speed Meister gets in the way, the pups spring into action to save the day.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... The Barbababies plant an avocado tree.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Present / Movie / Vinny - Tim, Tommy and Tia can't decide on the best gift for Grandma. Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie. Tim fakes it to prove he's just as cool as Kai's cousin.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Truck Rangers - Blaze and his friends have joined the Truck Rangers, a scouting club where trucks earn badges for their accomplishments.

programme.desc: Pups Save a Bah Humdinger - Mayor Humdinger is being very naughty on Christmas Eve and it's up to the Paw Patrol to help Santa and save Christmas.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep219
programme.desc: The Crew Makes Christmas Magical - It's Christmas Eve and Rubble & Crew gets a call from Santa Claus... he needs help to build all of the toys in time for Christmas! Speed Meister overhears and tries to be the construction hero

programme.desc: Promises - Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Kape
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC will close out its 2025 campaign with an electric flyweight matchup as top contenders Brandon Raw Dawg Royval shares the Octagon with Manel Starboy Kape on December 14 at the UFC APEX in Las Vegas. A former title challenger and perennial contender, Royval holds wins over Kai Kara-France, Brandon Moreno, and Tatsuro Taira and currently sits at No. 3 in the divisional rankings. Following an uneven start to his UFC tenure, the dynamic Kape has amassed a 6-1 record over his last seven outings, entering off back-to-back stoppage wins over Asu Almabayev and Bruno Silva
